name: Beyblade Face
text: If this card is Summoned or sent to the GY by a card effect; you can add 1 "Metal Fusion" or "Beyblade" card from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, except during the turn this card was sent there; Special Summon 1 "Beyblade" Fusion monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Beyblade Face" once per turn.
